tool_description: Easy-to-use API to access DuckDuckGo's comprehensive search results page.
name: DuckDuckGo Search API
title: DuckDuckGo Search API

api_list.name: HTML Search
api_list.description:
/htmlSearch allows you to perform a search query of [DuckDuckGo's HTML-only site](https://html.duckduckgo.com) and retrieve the results in JSON format.

Optionally easily filter your results by a language+location and date range.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The **q** parameter is required for the /htmlSearch endpoint and is used to specify the search query that you want to lookup.

optional_parameters.name: kl
optional_parameters.description:
The **kl** parameter is optional for the /htmlSearch endpoint and is used to specify the location and language code of the search results. (format: countrycode-languagecode).  

By default (if no value is passed for this parameter) the search results returned will be based on worldwide data without any location or language filters.

optional_parameters.name: df
optional_parameters.description:
The **df** parameter is optional for the /htmlSearch endpoint and is allows you to retrieve search results from specific timeframes - from the past day, week, month, or year.

By default (if no value is passed for this parameter) the search results returned will include data from all time periods.

api_list.name: HTML Search with Icons
api_list.description:
/htmlSearchWithIcons allows you to perform a search query of [DuckDuckGo's HTML-only site](https://html.duckduckgo.com) and retrieve the results including available favicons (encoded as base64, ready for you to save)

Optionally easily filter your results by a language+location and date range.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The **q** parameter is required for the /htmlSearchWithIcons endpoint and is used to specify the search query that you want to lookup.

optional_parameters.name: kl
optional_parameters.description:
The **kl** parameter is optional for the /htmlSearchWithIcons endpoint and is used to specify the location and language code of the search results (format: countrycode-languagecode).  

By default (if no value is passed for this parameter) the search results returned will be based on worldwide data without any location or language filters.

optional_parameters.name: df
optional_parameters.description:
The **df** parameter is optional for the /htmlSearchWithIcons endpoint and allows you to retrieve search results from specific timeframes - from the past day, week, month, or year.

By default (if no value is passed for this parameter) the search results returned will include data from all time periods.
